word_mean: 中和，中性化：使之成为中性

sentence.Network_en: The latest figures should neutralize the fears of inflation.
sentence.Network_cn: 最新的数据应该可以消除对通货膨胀的担忧。

sentence.Network_en: Acids neutralize alkalis and vice versa.
sentence.Network_cn: 酸能使碱中和,碱亦能使酸中和.

sentence.Network_en: The US is trying to neutralize the resolution in the UN Security Council.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国正试图在联合国安理会使该决议无效。

老实说我不想用中性（Neutral）来形容它的个性，因为中性就等于没有自己的个性，这对音响器材来说是不可能的，每一种音响器材 …
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... span n. 指距，跨距；一段时间 neutral a. 中立的；中性的 synchronize vi. 同时发生，同步.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French neutraliser, from medieval Latin neutralizare, from Latin neutralis (see neutral)

entry.tran: 使无效;使无法正常工作
entry.def: To neutralize something means to prevent it from having any effect or from working properly.

example.ex: The US is trying to neutralize the resolution in the UN Security Council...
example.tran: 美国正试图在联合国安理会使该决议无效。

example.ex: The intruder smashed a window to get in and then neutralized the alarm system.
example.tran: 闯入者打碎了一扇窗户进来，然后破坏了警报系统。

entry.def: When a chemical substance neutralizes an acid, it makes it less acid.

example.ex: Antacids are alkaline and they relieve pain by neutralizing acid in the contents of the stomach.
example.tran: 抗酸剂是碱性的，通过中和胃容物中的酸来减轻疼痛。

means.word_mean: 1. make politically neutral and thus inoffensive;
2. make ineffective by counterbalancing the effect of;

sentences.sentence: "This action will negate the effect of my efforts"

means.word_mean: 3. oppose and mitigate the effects of by contrary actions;

sentences.sentence: "This will counteract the foolish actions of my colleagues"

means.word_mean: 4. get rid of (someone who may be a threat) by killing;

auth_sentence.content: Smoothing out the newspaper and rolling it the other way to neutralize the first curve.
auth_sentence.res_content: Smoothing out the newspaper and rolling it the other way to neutralize the first curve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Smoothing out the newspaper and rolling it the other way to neutralize the first curve.

auth_sentence.content: China also fears that BMD is designed to neutralize its nuclear deterrent against the United States.
auth_sentence.res_content: China also fears that BMD is designed to neutralize its nuclear deterrent against the United States.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: China also fears that BMD is designed to neutralize its nuclear deterrent against the United States.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强[有"向"之意+vert转+ize……化,做等→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
ag一再+grand大+ize……化,做等→一再大→扩大[权力]等
civil公民的+ize……化,做等→v.使开化,使文明,教化
critic批评家+ize……化,做等→v.[criticise]批评,评论
ex出+orc巫术,邪魔+ize……化,做等→v.驱魔,去除[坏念头等]
fertile肥沃的+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
general总的,大体的+ize……化,做等→v.归纳,概括,推广,普及
lion狮子+ize……化,做等→把人当狮子一样看→崇拜
material物质+ize……化,做等→v.赋予形体,实现
neutral中间的,中和的+ize……化,做等→v.使无效,中和
popular流行的+ize…化,使…→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广
public公众的+ize……化,做等→v.宣传,引人注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+vital生命的+ize……化,做等→重新活
steril无菌的+ize……化,做等→v.使不育,杀菌
tempor时间+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

sentences.en: The increase in indirect taxation is intended to neutralize the reduction in income tax.
sentences.cn: 增加间接税是为了抵消所得税的减少。
